title: Here's a reading list of 20 articles that cover various aspects of emotion detection in the context of natural language processing (NLP
container-title: including the representation of emotion in psychology and the ethical implications of such models

title: Pre-training of Deep Bidirectional Transformers for Language Understanding"** by Jacob Devlin et al
While not solely focused on emotion detection, this paper introduces BERT, a model often used in emotion detection tasks
**"EmoNet: Fine-Grained Emotion Detection with Gated Recurrent Neural Networks"** by Saif M
Discusses a model specifically designed for detecting fine-grained emotions in text
**"DeepMoji: Using millions of emoji occurrences to learn any-domain representations for detecting sentiment, emotion and sarcasm"** by Bjarke Felbo et al
Explores the use of emoji occurrences to train models for emotion detection
**"Affective Text: A Survey of Methods and Approaches"** by Carlo Strapparava and Rada Mihalcea
Provides a comprehensive survey of methods for detecting emotions in text
**"Emotion Recognition from Text: A Survey"** by Lei Zhang
A detailed survey of various techniques and models used for emotion recognition in text
**"Learning Word Vectors for Sentiment Analysis"** by Andrew L
Discusses the use of word vectors in sentiment analysis, which is closely related to emotion detection
**"Contextualized Word Representations for Emotion Detection using Bidirectional LSTM-CRF"** by Pooja Rani et al
Explores the use of BiLSTM-CRF for emotion detection in text
**"Emotion Detection from Text: A Review"** by Anupam Kumar Bedi and Ritu Chauhan
Reviews various approaches and challenges in emotion detection from text
**"Affective Computing and Sentiment Analysis"** by Erik Cambria
Discusses the intersection of affective computing and sentiment analysis, including emotion detection
**"Emotion Detection in Text: A Review of Related Research"** by Yadollah Yaghoobi et al
A review of recent research in the field of emotion detection in text
**"The Nature of Emotion: Fundamental Questions"**
A foundational text discussing various theories and questions about the nature of emotions
Explores the role of emotions in human adaptation and psychological processes
**"The Emotional Brain: The Mysterious Underpinnings of Emotional Life"** by Joseph LeDoux
Discusses the neuroscience behind emotions and their representation in the brain
**"Emotion Regulation: Conceptual and Practical Issues"**
Examines the concept of emotion regulation and its implications for psychological well-being
**"Affective Neuroscience: The Foundations of Human and Animal Emotions"** by Jaak Panksepp
Provides a comprehensive overview of the neuroscience of emotions
### Ethical Impact of Emotion Detection Models
**"Ethics of Artificial Intelligence and Robotics"** by Vincent C
Discusses the ethical considerations of AI and robotics, including emotion detection
**"Algorithmic Bias Detection and Mitigation: Best Practices and Policies to Reduce Consumer Harms"** by Nicol Turner Lee
Explores the ethical implications of algorithmic bias, relevant to emotion detection models

container-title: **"The Ethics of Emotion in Artificial Intelligence Systems"** by Mark Coeckelbergh

title: Discusses the ethical considerations of incorporating emotions into AI systems
**"Fairness and Abstraction in Sociotechnical Systems"** by Selbst et al
Examines fairness in AI systems, including those used for emotion detection
**"Ethical Implications of Emotion AI: What Happens When Machines Learn to Read Our Feelings?"** by Kate Crawford and Ryan Calo
Discusses the ethical implications of emotion AI and its impact on society

These articles should provide a comprehensive overview of the current state of emotion detection in NLP, the psychological underpinnings of emotion, and the ethical considerations of deploying such models
